structure.unit: A KENTUCKY UNIFORM VOIDABLE TRANSACTIONS ACT

law.text: Unless displaced by the provisions of this chapter, the principles of law and equity,including the law merchant and the law relating to principal and agent, estoppel,laches, fraud, misrepresentation, duress, coercion, mistake, insolvency, or othervalidating or invalidating cause, supplement its provisions.
law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 37, sec. 12, effective January 1, 2016.
